announcements.announcement: Sign ups for Noche de Ciencias are now open! RSVP at http://tinyurl.com/zfhezha

SHPE Austin has opened up the application for the 2016 scholarships! If you have any questions feel free to ask Scholarship Director, Karen Siles. Go here https://docs.google.com/a/utexas.edu/forms/d/14PzspzhT4Ajv5ZVPTX_fmjtOfqDAjJPBgLpKzOANrXw/viewform?c=0&w=1 to apply!
The announcements posting is now live!
Join us for our next General Meeting this THURSDAY! Contact us for more details.

SHPE is volunteering with Austin Habitat for Humanity Young Professionals! Join us as we volunteer to build a new home for those in need! More details on our FB page! https://www.facebook.com/events/234904820222511/
Come out to our 1st General Meeting this Wednesday!
Come join us today for our Big Blue Happy Hour at 6pm! More information here! https://www.facebook.com/events/702552603226975/

SHPE Austin Professionals!  Join us this Monday Oct 17th at 5pm as we team up with SHPE-UT and Del Valle High school to host Noche de Ciencias Family Science Night.
Sing up to volunteer in our eventbrite link. Show up and check in with Rodrigo Estrada  https://www.eventbrite.com/e/noche-de-ciencias-at-del-valle-high-school-tickets-27716945129
Possible roles and duties:  Attend and greet teachers/parents/students as they stop by our tabling area, share our stories, and aid in the STEM based activities for participants.

In case you haven't seen the announcements that went out this morning we will be helping the girls construct either bridges or towers made of toothpicks, marshmallows, and gum drops. If you want to volunteer fill out this form: http://tinyurl.com/jb7sqcg
